nodes.excerpt: We collected 2.8m podcast connections according to the "Listeners Also Subscribed To" data in Apple Podcasts. Now you can vizualize any podcast's neighbours (and it's neighbour's neighbours) in a 3D graph and see which other podcasts share a similar audience.
nodes.title: The Podcast Audience Graph - Visualize podcast audience connections in 3D.
